job_description:
We are a direct marketing and customer acquisition company committed to delivering exceptional products/services to our clients potential customers. We are currently hiring a full time Marketing Assistant to join our growing team and assist with our expansion efforts in the Southern California area. As a Marketing Assistant, you will play a crucial role in supporting our marketing efforts and fostering positive customer relationships.
• Collaborate with the sales team to execute marketing campaigns that align with sales objectives.
• Maintain a professional and friendly demeanor while interacting with our clients potential customers
• Gather customer feedback and insights, sharing relevant information with the marketing and product development teams.
• Continuously learn about marketing trends, competitive landscape, and product enhancements to remain knowledgeable and effective in marketing discussions.
• Participate in lead generation, and customer outreach activities to gain practical sales and marketing experience
Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field preferred (or equivalent work experience)
• Strong communication skills, both written and verbal
• Customer-focused attitude with a genuine desire to provide exceptional service
• Comfortable using a computer or I-pad
• Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail
• Ability to multitask and work efficiently in a fast-paced environment
• Experience in customer service, hospitality, or marketing is a plus
#Li-Onsite
